conversation.content: Of course my check is short. Fifty bucks missing. Because why would anything just...
Okay. Let me—actually wait. I need your employee ID first. To pull up. The payroll records.
Hmm, let me see here... It's EMP-7742. Or 7243. No wait, 7742.
Got it. So I'm looking at—hold on. Your last pay period. December 1st through 15th. Shows $1,247.50 gross. But net is—er, that's odd actually.
Let me guess. Something's wrong with the system. And there's nothing you can...
No no. I see it. There's a—hmm. Deduction code DC-50-UNIF. Fifty dollars. For uniform. But that's—let me check something else real quick.
Uniform? What uniform? We wear our own clothes. This is ridiculous.
Right. So. I think—no actually I know what happened. Someone applied. The wrong deduction category. Should've been UC-00-NONE. For your position. Code 3847. Horse groom. No uniform requirement.
Okay so that means... what exactly? Can you fix it or...?
Absolutely. I'm submitting—well first. Let me document this. Incident number INC-2024-8923. For the correction. Should process. Within 24 to 48 hours probably.
Twenty-four to forty-eight. Great. My rent was due yesterday.
Oh. Eesh. Okay so—actually wait. I might be able to. Let me try something. If I flag it as. Payroll error priority. Code PEP-1.
Hmm, what if that doesn't work though? I mean, I need this money...
It'll work. I'm putting—er, basically. Your case reference. PR-8923-URGENT. Direct to. The payroll supervisor's queue. They process these. Same day usually. By 4 PM Eastern.
Oh. Okay so... today? Like actually today? Not corporate "today" meaning next week?
Today today. Real today. The supervisor—I can see. She's actually. Online right now. Username PSUP-Martinez. Already has. Three corrections pending. Yours makes four.
Alright. I guess that's... better than I expected. What happens if it doesn't though?
Then you call back. Reference this incident. INC-2024-8923. And ask for—well actually. Ask for me. Agent A-7625. I'll escalate it. To regional payroll directly.
Okay. Yeah. Thanks. I'll check my account later then...
Perfect. You should get. An email confirmation too. From payroll@company.org. Within the hour. With your correction amount. Fifty dollars exactly. Plus the processing confirmation.
